metadata.title: CVE-2017-9735 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Jetty through 9.4.x is prone to a timing channel inutil/security/Password.java, which makes it easier for remote attackers toobtain access by observing elapsed times before rejection of incorrectpasswords.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jetty9 - 9.2.23-1
libjetty9-extra-java - 9.2.23-1
libjetty9-java - 9.2.23-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.2.23-1').
